attributes.action: For MP Helen Joanne "Jo" Cox (RIP) to be posthumously awarded the George Cross.
attributes.additional_details: If reports are accurate that an individual came to Mrs Cox's aid then if appropriate that individual should be considered for a GC also.
attributes.background: MP Jo Cox died serving British democracy and throughout her career was dedicated to humanitarian causes. Therefore we the undersigned feel it is only right and fitting to posthumously award her the GC, the highest gallantry award for civilians.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
